relevant_findings.respiratory: Inspiratory crackles heard at both lung bases.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft and nontender, no masses or organomegaly.
relevant_findings.extremities: Pitting edema (+) of the legs, extending proximally to 3 cm below the knees.
relevant_findings.muscle_strength: Motor strength rated 5 out of 5 in all muscle groups.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Symptoms improved over the next two days while receiving prednisone.

relevant_findings.muscle_strength: Motor strength rated 4+ out of 5+ in all muscle groups of the arms and legs, tenderness with shoulder abduction.
relevant_findings.other: Normal range of motion of all joints.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased proximal muscle weakness documented four days before admission.
